text: Joshua Ryan Evans (10 January 1982 - 5 August 2002) was an American actor. He was best known for acting as Timmy in the television series Passions. He also acted in movies. Due to dwarfism, Josh was only tall and had the voice of a small child. Evans died while undergoing surgery. He was born in Hayward, California and died in San Diego, California. title: Josh Ryan Evans
